subtitle: Select your profile from the participants below to register

info.title: Manual Selection Required
info.message: We couldn't automatically match your account email with the race registration data. Please find and select your profile from the list below to complete registration.

error.missingParamsMessage: Unable to load participants. Required information is missing.
error.missingDataMessage: Registration data is incomplete. Please try again.
error.noBibNumberMessage: This participant has no bib number and cannot be registered.
error.registrationFailedMessage: Unable to register. Please try again.
error.invalidDataMessage: Missing confirmation data. Please try again.
error.confirmationFailedMessage: Unable to confirm registration. Please try again.
error.alreadyRegisteredMessage: You are already registered for this event.
error.invalidBibMessage: The bib number is invalid. Please try again.
error.validationErrorMessage: Some information is missing or invalid.
error.networkErrorMessage: Unable to connect. Please check your internet and try again.
